alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern DeKalb and central Fulton Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Kirkwood, or near Decatur, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, North Druid Hills, Belvedere Park, North Decatur, West End, Virginia Highland, Sweet Auburn, Turner Field, Piedmont Park, Kirkwood, Lakewood Park, Panthersville, East Lake, Gresham Park, La Vista and Little Five Points. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
